summary: Standalone Khajiit follower, Nyanta. One Handed, double wielding combat style.
descriptionHtml:
Standalone Khajiit Follower, inspired by the "Log Horizon" Light Novel/Anime character Nyanta. I created Nyanta for my wife, a huge Log Horizon fan, but I decided to share him and I hope you find him useful.

- Essential
- One Handed, Dual Wielding combat style (default weapons are twin glass swords)
- Levels with player (min Lvl 10, max Lvl 80)
- Nyanta will be waiting for you on the Sleeping Giant Inn, Riverwood.

This is my first upload, so it's a very simple, straightforward follower, done with only vanilla assets. No other mods required, just an updated version of Skyrim.
author: JohnJrFF
